Text.Page:
, we've got a time-sensitive delivery to one of our best clients. Deliver the goods on time and safely. The consequences of poor customer service are...dire.

The package goes to Edahm in Crescentia. Use a pegasus to get there faster.
How may I help you today?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"This is from Imesti."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

Shh! I don't want to attract attention.

Take this, and just walk away casually.
